title: Forbidden Alpha
description: My name is Chai Macek, and I’ve got problems. Four of them to be exact.First, an old friend returns from the dead with a shiny new set of fangs. Second, my hormonal werewolf client is dead set on marking me as his mate. Seriously. So not going there. Third, said werewolf might also be a cold-blooded killer. Note to self: implement better screening of future clients. Finally, and most important of all, I’m ridiculously low on chocolate. Who’d have thought the life of a half-blood gypsy could be so demanding? Certainly not me. If only I had a crystal ball…Forbidden Alpha is the first book in the edgy yet romantic urban fantasy series, “Love Sex Magick”. Grab your copy today and find out why Chai and her rag-tag group of supernatural friends deserve a spot on your must-read list.
author: Missy Lynn Ryan
